Name: Wane Boots
Description:
Seems to be able to obtain higher Intellect attributes.

[The advanced attributes of this gear will not include luck]
Description$english:
Seems to be able to obtain higher Intellect attributes.

[The advanced attributes of this gear will not include luck]
Description2$english:
Handcrafted to perfection—though devoid of rare attributes, every detail is imbued with the artisan's soul.

This classic reconnaissance outfit is crafted from comfortable, durable materials, offering exceptional mobility—an adventurer's favorite.

NeedMaterial.Description: A flax-spun material utilized in woven fabrications,
NeedMaterial.Description$english: A flax-spun material utilized in woven fabrications,
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Fish resin-cured leather made from sanded and stitched animal hides for enhanced flexibility.

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: White natural alum serves as a key raw material in the production of deodorants and leather tanning agents.

NeedMaterial.Name: Engram Dust Crystals
NeedMaterial.Description:
An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.
NeedMaterial.Description$english:
An exceptionally rare collected resource.
The higher level of the gatherable, the greater the chance of obtaining it. It is subject to a weekly acquisition limit.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare crystal shimmering with starlight.

NeedMaterial.Name: Sovereign Alloy Shard
NeedMaterial.Description: After collecting enough Sovereign Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 80 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After collecting enough Sovereign Alloy Shard, you can go to the Artisan Guild and exchange them for level 80 purple quality gear at the gear forging Artisan Harvey.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: This alloy is smelted from materials from powerful monsters and rare minerals, capable of reacting to Engram and emitting a flickering glow. Due to its unique research value, it is highly favored by experts on the Bapharian Legacy.
